TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi beforefieldinit Label extends System.Windows.Forms.Control

summary.span: 代表標準 Windows 標籤。

span.span: Represents a standard Windows label.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 控制項通常會用來為控制項提供描述性文字。 controls are typically used to provide descriptive text for a control. 例如，您可以使用以加入描述性文字通知使用者有關的預期在控制項中的資料類型的控制項。For example, you can use a to add descriptive text for a control to inform the user about the type of data expected in the control. 控制項也可用來加入描述性文字，以便為使用者提供有用的資訊。 controls can also be used to add descriptive text to a to provide the user with helpful information. 例如，您可以加入頂端，說明如何輸入表單上控制項中的資料上的使用者。For example, you can add a to the top of a that provides instructions to the user on how to input data in the controls on the form. 控制項也可用來顯示執行階段狀態相關資訊的應用程式。 controls can be also used to display run time information on the status of an application. 例如，您可以加入控制項至表單，以處理的檔案清單時，顯示每個檔案的狀態。For example, you can add a control to a form to display the status of each file as a list of files is processed. A參與、 表單的定位順序，但不會接收的焦點 （定位順序中的下一個控制項接收焦點）。A participates in the tab order of a form, but does not receive focus (the next control in the tab order receives focus). 例如，如果屬性設定為`true`，和助憶鍵字元 — & 符號之後的第一個字元 (&) — 中指定屬性的控制項，當使用者按下 ALT + 的助憶鍵時，焦點會移至定位順序中的下一個控制項。For example, if the property is set to `true`, and a mnemonic character—the first character after an ampersand (&)—is specified in the property of the control, when a user presses ALT+ the mnemonic key, focus moves to the next control in the tab order. 這項功能提供鍵盤瀏覽表單。This feature provides keyboard navigation for a form. 除了顯示的文字，控制項也可以顯示的映像使用屬性或組合和屬性。In addition to displaying text, the control can also display an image using the property, or a combination of the and properties. > [!NOTE] > A才能進行透明藉由設定其屬性`Color.Transparent`。A can be made transparent by setting its property to `Color.Transparent`. 當您使用透明的標籤時，使用只有目前裝置座標系統在容器上繪製或背景可能未正確繪製。When you use a transparent label, use only the current device coordinate system to draw on the container, or the background might paint improperly. ## Examples 下列程式碼範例示範如何建立控制項有 3d 框線，包含影像。The following code example demonstrates how to create a control that has a three-dimensional border and contains an image. 使用顯示的影像和屬性。The image is displayed using the and properties. 控制項也有標題，以指定的助憶鍵字元。The control also has a caption with a mnemonic character specified. 範例程式碼使用和屬性，以適當的大小控制項。The example code uses the and properties to properly size the control. 這個範例需要已經建立且名為 imageList1 和它已經載入兩個映像。This example requires that an has been created and named imageList1 and that it has loaded two images. 這個範例也會需要的程式碼是在表單中具有加入其程式碼的命名空間。The example also requires that the code is within a form that has the namespace added to its code. [!code-cpp[Classic Label Example#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/Classic Label Example/CPP/source.cpp#1)] [!code-csharp[Classic Label Example#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/Classic Label Example/CS/source.cs#1)] [!code-vb[Classic Label Example#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Winforms/Classic Label Example/VB/source.vb#1)]

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig specialname rtspecialname instance void .ctor() cil managed

summary.span: 初始化 類別的新執行個體。

span.span: Initializes a new instance of the class.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 根據預設，標籤會顯示其屬性設定為`false`與其屬性設定為`BorderStyle.None`。By default, a label is displayed with its property set to `false` and with its property set to `BorderStyle.None`. ## Examples 下列程式碼範例示範如何建立有 3d 框線和顯示使用之影像的控制項和屬性。The following code example demonstrates how to create a control that has a three-dimensional border and an image displayed using the and properties. 控制項也有標題，以指定的助憶鍵字元。The control also has a caption with a mnemonic character specified. 範例程式碼使用和屬性，以適當的大小控制項在表單上顯示於它。The example code uses the and properties to properly size the control on the form on which it is displayed. 這個範例需要已經建立且名為 imageList1 和它已經載入兩個映像。This example requires that an has been created and named imageList1 and that it has loaded two images. 這個範例也會需要的程式碼是在表單中具有加入其程式碼的命名空間。The example also requires that the code is within a form that has the namespace added to its code. [!code-cpp[Classic Label Example#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/Classic Label Example/CPP/source.cpp#1)] [!code-csharp[Classic Label Example#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/Classic Label Example/CS/source.cs#1)] [!code-vb[Classic Label Example#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Winforms/Classic Label Example/VB/source.vb#1)]

MemberSignature.Value: public: property bool AutoEllipsis { bool get(); void set(bool value); };

summary.span: 取得或設定值，指出省略字元 (...) 是否會顯示在 的右邊緣，表示 文字超過 的指定長度。

span.span: Gets or sets a value indicating whether the ellipsis character (...) appears at the right edge of the , denoting that the text extends beyond the specified length of the .

value.span: 如果要以省略符號表示還有其他標籤文字，則為 ，否則為 。

span.span: if the additional label text is to be indicated by an ellipsis; otherwise, .
The default is .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 設定至`true`超出的寬度的文字顯示使用者通過滑鼠控制。Set to `true` to display text that extends beyond the width of the when the user passes over the control with the mouse. 如果是`true`，標籤將會成長以容納文字，並不會出現省略符號。If is `true`, the label will grow to fit the text and an ellipsis will not appear. > [!IMPORTANT] > 如果字型的高度比寬大和是`true`，您必須設定至`false`要繪製的文字。If the font is taller than the height of the and is `true`, you must set to `false` for text to be drawn.

MemberSignature.Value: public override bool AutoSize { get; set; }
Public Overrides Property AutoSize As Boolean
public: virtual property bool AutoSize { bool get(); void set(bool value); };

summary.span: 取得或設定值，指出控制項是否自動調整大小以顯示其全部內容。

span.span: Gets or sets a value indicating whether the control is automatically resized to display its entire contents.

value.span: 如果控制項會配合內容調整寬度，則為 ，否則為 。

span.span: if the control adjusts its width to closely fit its contents; otherwise, .

para.span: 使用設計工具加入至表單時，預設值為 。

span.span: When added to a form using the designer, the default value is .

para.span: 從程式碼具現化時，預設值為 。

span.span: When instantiated from code, the default value is .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 當這個屬性設定為`true`、調整其寬度，以顯示其全部內容。When this property is set to `true`, the adjusts its width to display its entire contents. 這個屬性通常會設定為`true`當您使用控制項來顯示各種長度的文字，例如應用程式處理序的狀態。This property is typically set to `true` when you use a control to display various lengths of text, such as the status of an application process. 應用程式會顯示各種不同的語言中的文字和文字的大小可能會增加或減少根據 Windows 中的語言設定時，您也可以使用這個屬性。You can also use this property when the application will display text in various languages, and the size of the text might increase or decrease based on the language settings in Windows. > [!IMPORTANT] > 如果字型的高度比寬大和是`true`，您必須設定至`false`要繪製的文字。If the font is taller than the height of the and is `true`, you must set to `false` for text to be drawn. ## Examples 下列程式碼範例示範屬性。The following code example demonstrates the property. 若要執行此範例中，貼上下列程式碼在表單和呼叫`InitializeLabel`從表單的建構函式的方法或`Load`方法。To run this example, paste the following code in a form and call the `InitializeLabel` method from the form's constructor or `Load` method. [!code-cpp[System.Windows.Forms.LabelAutoSize#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Windows.Forms.LabelAutoSize/CPP/form1.cpp#1)] [!code-csharp[System.Windows.Forms.LabelAutoSize#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Windows.Forms.LabelAutoSize/CS/form1.cs#1)] [!code-vb[System.Windows.Forms.LabelAutoSize#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Windows.Forms.LabelAutoSize/VB/form1.vb#1)]

MemberSignature.Value: Public Custom Event AutoSizeChanged As EventHandler

summary.span: 發生於 屬性的值變更時。

span.span: Occurs when the value of the property changes.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 如需處理事件的詳細資訊，請參閱[處理和引發事件](~/docs/standard/events/index.md)。For more information about handling events, see [Handling and Raising Events](~/docs/standard/events/index.md). ## Examples 下列程式碼範例示範如何使用這個成員。The following code example demonstrates the use of this member. 在範例中，事件處理常式會報告一次事件。In the example, an event handler reports on the occurrence of the event. 此報表可協助您了解事件發生的時機，並可協助您偵錯。This report helps you to learn when the event occurs and can assist you in debugging. 若要報告多個事件或事件經常發生，請考慮更換與或將訊息附加到多行。To report on multiple events or on events that occur frequently, consider replacing with or appending the message to a multiline . 若要執行範例程式碼，將它貼到包含類型的執行個體的專案名為 Label1。To run the example code, paste it into a project that contains an instance of type named Label1. 請確定事件處理常式關聯事件。Then ensure that the event handler is associated with the event. [!code-csharp[System.Windows.Forms.EventExamples#458](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Windows.Forms.EventExamples/CS/EventExamples.cs#458)] [!code-vb[System.Windows.Forms.EventExamples#458](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Windows.Forms.EventExamples/VB/EventExamples.vb#458)]

remarks.format: ## Remarks 您可以使用這個屬性加入至控制項的框線。You can use this property to add a border to the control. 這個屬性通常用來區分的標籤從另一個控制項應用程式中顯示處理序的狀態。This property is typically used to differentiate a that labels another control from a that displays the status of a process in an application. ## Examples 下列程式碼範例示範如何建立有 3d 框線和顯示使用之影像的控制項和屬性。The following code example demonstrates how to create a control that has a three-dimensional border and an image displayed using the and properties. 控制項也有標題，以指定的助憶鍵字元。The control also has a caption with a mnemonic character specified. 範例程式碼使用和屬性，以適當的大小控制項在表單上顯示於它。The example code uses the and properties to properly size the control on the form on which it is displayed. 這個範例需要已經建立且名為 imageList1 和它已經載入兩個映像。This example requires that an has been created and named imageList1 and that it has loaded two images. 這個範例也會需要的程式碼是在表單中具有加入其程式碼的命名空間。The example also requires that the code is within a form that has the namespace added to its code. [!code-cpp[Classic Label Example#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/Classic Label Example/CPP/source.cpp#1)] [!code-csharp[Classic Label Example#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/Classic Label Example/CS/source.cs#1)] [!code-vb[Classic Label Example#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Winforms/Classic Label Example/VB/source.vb#1)]

MemberSignature.Value: .method familyhidebysig virtual instance void Dispose(bool disposing) cil managed
Protected Overrides Sub Dispose (disposing As Boolean)

param.name: disposing
param.span: 表示釋放 Managed 和 Unmanaged 資源， 則表示只釋放 Unmanaged 資源。

span.span: to release both managed and unmanaged resources; to release only unmanaged resources.

summary.span: 釋放 所使用的 Unmanaged 資源，並選擇性地釋放 Managed 資源。

span.span: Releases the unmanaged resources used by the and optionally releases the managed resources.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 這個方法會呼叫公用`Dispose`方法和方法。This method is called by the public `Dispose` method and the method. `Dispose` 叫用受保護`Dispose(Boolean)`方法`disposing`參數設定為`true`。`Dispose` invokes the protected `Dispose(Boolean)` method with the `disposing` parameter set to `true`. 叫用`Dispose`與`disposing`設`false`。 invokes `Dispose` with `disposing` set to `false`. 當`disposing`參數為 true，這個方法的任何 managed 物件所持有的資源全部釋出這個參考。When the `disposing` parameter is true, this method releases all resources held by any managed objects that this references. 這個方法會叫用每個參考物件的 `Dispose` 方法。This method invokes the `Dispose` method of each referenced object.

para.span: 可以被其他物件呼叫多次。

span.span: can be called multiple times by other objects.

para.span: 在覆寫小心不要參考物件已處置過的早期呼叫中。

span.span: When overriding be careful not to reference objects that have been previously disposed of in an earlier call to .

para.span: 如需有關如何實作，請參閱[實作 Dispose 方法](~/docs/standard/garbage-collection/implementing-dispose.md)。

span.span: For more information about how to implement , see [Implementing a Dispose Method](~/docs/standard/garbage-collection/implementing-dispose.md).

para.span: 如需有關和，請參閱[清除 Unmanaged 資源上](~/docs/standard/garbage-collection/unmanaged.md)和[覆寫 Finalize 方法](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/8026cb68-fe93-43fc-96c1-c09ad7d64cd3)。

span.span: For more information about and , see [Cleaning Up Unmanaged Resources](~/docs/standard/garbage-collection/unmanaged.md) and [Overriding the Finalize Method](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/8026cb68-fe93-43fc-96c1-c09ad7d64cd3).

MemberSignature.Value: public: property System::Windows::Forms::FlatStyle FlatStyle { System::Windows::Forms::FlatStyle get(); void set(System::Windows::Forms::FlatStyle value); };

summary.span: 取得或設定標籤控制項的平面樣式外觀。

span.span: Gets or sets the flat style appearance of the label control.
One of the values.
The default value is .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 當屬性設定為`FlatStyle.System`，指派給任何值， ， ，和屬性會被忽略。When the property is set to `FlatStyle.System`, any values assigned to the , , , and properties are ignored. 此外，屬性會略過不垂直屬性設定的任何屬性值。In addition, the property ignores any property values that are not vertical property settings. 水平對齊設定控制項的頂端對齊屬性。Horizontally aligned settings of the property are aligned to the top of the control. 例如，如果您設定屬性`ContentAlignment.TopCenter`， `ContentAlignment.MiddleCenter`，或`ContentAlignment.BottomCenter`，當屬性設定為`FlatStyle.System`中的文字控制項將會對齊上方與中央位置在控制項的範圍。For example, if you set the property to `ContentAlignment.TopCenter`, `ContentAlignment.MiddleCenter`, or `ContentAlignment.BottomCenter`, when the property is set to `FlatStyle.System`, the text in the control will be aligned to the top and center locations within the bounds of the control. > [!NOTE] > 在.NET Framework 1.1 中，設定屬性`FlatStyle.System`不會造成值屬性被忽略。In the .NET Framework version 1.1, setting the property to `FlatStyle.System` does not cause the value of the property to be ignored. 此外，此屬性會有任何作用在衍生類別中， 。In addition, the property has no effect in the derived class, .

exception.span: 所指派的值不是其中一個 值。

span.span: The value assigned is not one of the values.

Public Overrides Function GetPreferredSize (proposedSize As Size) As Size

param.name: proposedSize

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此屬性可讓您的界限內的影像對齊控制項，以確保會正確顯示的影像。This property enables you to align an image within the boundaries of the control to ensure that the image is properly displayed. 您可以將映像加入使用屬性或和屬性。You can add an image to a using the property or the and properties. 無法延展或壓縮填滿控制項，控制項是否大於或小於影像控制項中顯示的影像。Images displayed in the control cannot be stretched or shrunk to fill the control if the control is larger or smaller than the image. ## Examples 下列程式碼範例示範如何建立有 3d 框線和顯示使用之影像的控制項和屬性。The following code example demonstrates how to create a control that has a three-dimensional border and an image displayed using the and properties. 控制項也有標題，以指定的助憶鍵字元。The control also has a caption with a mnemonic character specified. 範例程式碼使用和屬性，以適當的大小控制項在表單上顯示於它。The example code uses the and properties to properly size the control on the form on which it is displayed. 這個範例需要已經建立且名為 imageList1 和它已經載入兩個映像。This example requires that an has been created and named imageList1 and that it has loaded two images. 這個範例也會需要的程式碼是在表單中具有加入其程式碼的命名空間。The example also requires that the code is within a form that has the namespace added to its code. [!code-cpp[Classic Label Example#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/Classic Label Example/CPP/source.cpp#1)] [!code-csharp[Classic Label Example#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/Classic Label Example/CS/source.cs#1)] [!code-vb[Classic Label Example#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Winforms/Classic Label Example/VB/source.vb#1)]

remarks.format: ## Remarks 引發事件會透過委派叫用此事件處理常式。Raising an event invokes the event handler through a delegate. 如需詳細資訊，請參閱[處理和引發事件](~/docs/standard/events/index.md)。For more information, see [Handling and Raising Events](~/docs/standard/events/index.md). 方法也允許衍生類別處理事件，而不用附加委派。The method also allows derived classes to handle the event without attaching a delegate. 這是在衍生類別中處理事件的慣用技巧。This is the preferred technique for handling the event in a derived class.

para.span: 當在衍生類別中覆寫 時，請確定呼叫基底類別的 方法，使已註冊的委派能接收到事件。

span.span: When overriding in a derived class, be sure to call the base class's method so that registered delegates receive the event.

MemberSignature.Value: Public Overridable ReadOnly Property PreferredHeight As Integer
public: virtual property int PreferredHeight { int get(); };

summary.span: 取得控制項的慣用高度。

span.span: Gets the preferred height of the control.

value.span: 控制項的高度 (單位為像素)，假設所顯示的是單行文字。

span.span: The height of the control (in pixels), assuming a single line of text is displayed.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 這個屬性會傳回控制項應該才能正確顯示文字，根據指派給控制項的字型的高度。This property returns the height that the control should be in order to properly display text, based on the font assigned to the control. 您可以使用這個屬性連同屬性中的文字時，確保正確顯示控制項。You can use this property along with the property to ensure that the text in the control is displayed properly. 您可以使用自動調整高度和寬度屬性文字和字型的大小為基礎的控制項。You can use the property to automatically adjust the height and the width of the control, based on the text and font size. > [!NOTE] > 如果屬性控制設為 `BorderStyle.None`，所傳回的值屬性就會變大，因為沒有框線。If the property of the control is set to `BorderStyle.None`, the value returned by property will be larger due to the lack of borders. ## Examples 下列程式碼範例示範如何建立有 3d 框線和顯示使用之影像的控制項和屬性。The following code example demonstrates how to create a control that has a three-dimensional border and an image displayed using the and properties. 控制項也有標題，以指定的助憶鍵字元。The control also has a caption with a mnemonic character specified. 範例程式碼使用和屬性，以適當的大小控制項在表單上顯示於它。The example code uses the and properties to properly size the control on the form on which it is displayed. 這個範例需要已經建立且名為 imageList1 和它已經載入兩個映像。This example requires that an has been created and named imageList1 and that it has loaded two images. 這個範例也會需要的程式碼是在表單中具有加入其程式碼的命名空間。The example also requires that the code is within a form that has the namespace added to its code. [!code-cpp[Classic Label Example#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/Classic Label Example/CPP/source.cpp#1)] [!code-csharp[Classic Label Example#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/Classic Label Example/CS/source.cs#1)] [!code-vb[Classic Label Example#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Winforms/Classic Label Example/VB/source.vb#1)]

MemberSignature.Value: Public Overridable ReadOnly Property PreferredWidth As Integer
public: virtual property int PreferredWidth { int get(); };

summary.span: 取得控制項的慣用寬度。

span.span: Gets the preferred width of the control.

value.span: 控制項的寬度 (單位為像素)，假設所顯示的是單行文字。

span.span: The width of the control (in pixels), assuming a single line of text is displayed.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 這個屬性會傳回文字字串的長度，但不接受換列入考量。This property returns the length of the text string, but does not take line wrapping into consideration. 比方說，測量 300 像素寬的文字字串可以顯示為三行在這只是 100 像素寬。For example, a text string that measures 300 pixels wide could be displayed as three lines in a that is only 100 pixels wide. 屬性仍會傳回 300 像素為單位。The property still returns 300 pixels. 您可以使用這個屬性，連同屬性，以確保在文字正確顯示控制項。You can use this property, along with the property, to ensure that the text in the control is displayed properly. 您可以使用自動調整高度和寬度屬性控制項為基礎的文字和字型的大小。You can use the property to automatically adjust the height and the width of the control based on the text and font size. > [!NOTE] > 如果屬性控制設為 `BorderStyle.None`，所傳回的值屬性就會變大，因為沒有框線。If the property of the control is set to `BorderStyle.None`, the value returned by property will be larger due to the lack of borders. ## Examples 下列程式碼範例示範如何建立有 3d 框線和顯示使用之影像的控制項和屬性。The following code example demonstrates how to create a control that has a three-dimensional border and an image displayed using the and properties. 控制項也有標題，以指定的助憶鍵字元。The control also has a caption with a mnemonic character specified. 範例程式碼使用和屬性，以適當的大小控制項在表單上顯示於它。The example code uses the and properties to properly size the control on the form on which it is displayed. 這個範例需要已經建立且名為 imageList1 和它已經載入兩個映像。This example requires that an has been created and named imageList1 and that it has loaded two images. 這個範例也會需要的程式碼是在表單中具有加入其程式碼的命名空間。The example also requires that the code is within a form that has the namespace added to its code. [!code-cpp[Classic Label Example#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/Classic Label Example/CPP/source.cpp#1)] [!code-csharp[Classic Label Example#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/Classic Label Example/CS/source.cs#1)] [!code-vb[Classic Label Example#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Winforms/Classic Label Example/VB/source.vb#1)]

remarks.format: ## Remarks 類別繼承自`Label`可以覆寫這個方法來判斷是否衍生的控制項背景呈現以透明的方式繪製控制項在表單上。Classes that inherit from `Label` can override this method to determine whether the derived control background will be rendered transparently on the form on which the control is drawn.

summary.span: 設定標籤的指定範圍。

span.span: Sets the specified bounds of the label.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 如果您設定屬性`true`，標籤將會重新調整大小以符合標籤的內容。If you set the property to `true`, the label will be sized to fit the contents of the label. 如果您設定至`false`之後呼叫方法中，標籤將會收到您的呼叫中指定的維度。If you set to `false` after calling the method, the label will receive the dimensions you specified in the call.

The default is .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 屬性無關類別，因此設定至`true`沒有任何作用。The property is not relevant for the class, so setting to `true` has no effect.

summary.span: 取得或設定標籤中文字的對齊方式。

span.span: Gets or sets the alignment of text in the label.
One of the values.
The default is .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 若要將標籤以符合您的表單上控制項的版面配置中的文字對齊，您可以使用這個屬性。You can use this property to align the text within a label to match the layout of controls on your form. 例如，如果您的控制項位於右邊的標籤，您可以設定靠右對齊水平對齊方式的其中一個屬性 (， ， ) 的文字對齊右邊緣和要與您的控制項對齊的標籤。For example, if your controls are located to the right edge of the labels, you can set the property to one of the right-aligned horizontal alignments (, , ) and the text will be aligned with the right edge of the labels to align with your controls.

exception.span: 所指派的值不是其中一個 值。

span.span: The value assigned is not one of the values.

MemberSignature.Value: Public Custom Event TextAlignChanged As EventHandler

summary.span: 發生於 屬性的值已變更時。

span.span: Occurs when the value of the property has changed.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 如需處理事件的詳細資訊，請參閱[處理和引發事件](~/docs/standard/events/index.md)。For more information about handling events, see [Handling and Raising Events](~/docs/standard/events/index.md). ## Examples 下列程式碼範例示範如何使用這個成員。The following code example demonstrates the use of this member. 在範例中，事件處理常式會報告一次事件。In the example, an event handler reports on the occurrence of the event. 此報表可協助您了解事件發生的時機，並可協助您偵錯。This report helps you to learn when the event occurs and can assist you in debugging. 若要報告多個事件或事件經常發生，請考慮更換與或將訊息附加到多行。To report on multiple events or on events that occur frequently, consider replacing with or appending the message to a multiline . 若要執行範例程式碼，將它貼到包含類型的執行個體的專案名為 Label1。To run the example code, paste it into a project that contains an instance of type named Label1. 請確定事件處理常式關聯事件。Then ensure that the event handler is associated with the event. [!code-csharp[System.Windows.Forms.EventExamples#459](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Windows.Forms.EventExamples/CS/EventExamples.cs#459)] [!code-vb[System.Windows.Forms.EventExamples#459](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Windows.Forms.EventExamples/VB/EventExamples.vb#459)]

MemberSignature.Value: public: property bool UseCompatibleTextRendering { bool get(); void set(bool value); };

summary.span: 取得或設定值，決定要使用 類別 ([!INCLUDE[ndptecgdiplus](~/includes/ndptecgdiplus-md.md)]) 還是 類別 ([!INCLUDE[ndptecgdi](~/includes/ndptecgdi-md.md)]) 來呈現文字。

span.span: Gets or sets a value that determines whether to use the class ([!INCLUDE[ndptecgdiplus](~/includes/ndptecgdiplus-md.md)]) or the class ([!INCLUDE[ndptecgdi](~/includes/ndptecgdi-md.md)]) to render text.

value.span: 如果類別應該用來執行與 1.0 和 1.1 版的相容性的文字轉譯。

span.span: if the class should be used to perform text rendering for compatibility with versions 1.0 and 1.1.
of the .NET Framework; otherwise, .
The default is .

remarks.format: ## Remarks `UseCompatibleTextRendering`屬性為了提供 visual Windows Form 控制項之間的相容性呈現文字使用類別和[!INCLUDE[net_v10_short](~/includes/net-v10-short-md.md)]和[!INCLUDE[net_v11_short](~/includes/net-v11-short-md.md)]應用程式，執行自訂文字轉譯使用類別。The `UseCompatibleTextRendering` property is intended to provide visual compatibility between Windows Forms controls that render text using the class and [!INCLUDE[net_v10_short](~/includes/net-v10-short-md.md)] and [!INCLUDE[net_v11_short](~/includes/net-v11-short-md.md)] applications that perform custom text rendering using the class. 在大部分情況下，如果您的應用程式未從升級[!INCLUDE[net_v10_short](~/includes/net-v10-short-md.md)]或[!INCLUDE[net_v11_short](~/includes/net-v11-short-md.md)]，建議您保持`UseCompatibleTextRendering`設定的預設值為`false`。In most cases, if your application is not being upgraded from [!INCLUDE[net_v10_short](~/includes/net-v10-short-md.md)] or [!INCLUDE[net_v11_short](~/includes/net-v11-short-md.md)], it is recommended that you leave `UseCompatibleTextRendering` set to the default value of `false`. [!INCLUDE[ndptecgdi](~/includes/ndptecgdi-md.md)]基礎類別中引進了[!INCLUDE[dnprdnlong](~/includes/dnprdnlong-md.md)]為了提升效能，讓文字看起來比較好，並改善的國際字型支援。The [!INCLUDE[ndptecgdi](~/includes/ndptecgdi-md.md)] based class was introduced in the [!INCLUDE[dnprdnlong](~/includes/dnprdnlong-md.md)] to improve performance, make text look better, and improve support for international fonts. 在舊版的[!INCLUDE[dnprdnshort](~/includes/dnprdnshort-md.md)]、[!INCLUDE[ndptecgdiplus](~/includes/ndptecgdiplus-md.md)]基礎類別用來執行所有的文字轉譯。In earlier versions of the [!INCLUDE[dnprdnshort](~/includes/dnprdnshort-md.md)], the [!INCLUDE[ndptecgdiplus](~/includes/ndptecgdiplus-md.md)] based class was used to perform all text rendering. [!INCLUDE[ndptecgdi](~/includes/ndptecgdi-md.md)] 計算字元間距和自動換行以不同的方式從[!INCLUDE[ndptecgdiplus](~/includes/ndptecgdiplus-md.md)]。 calculates character spacing and word wrapping differently from [!INCLUDE[ndptecgdiplus](~/includes/ndptecgdiplus-md.md)]. 在 Windows Form 應用程式中使用類別來呈現文字中，這可能會導致使用的控制項的文字出現不同的應用程式中的其他文字。In a Windows Forms application that uses the class to render text, this could cause the text for controls that use to appear different from the other text in the application. 若要解決此不相容，您可以設定`UseCompatibleTextRendering`屬性`true`特定控制項。To resolve this incompatibility, you can set the `UseCompatibleTextRendering` property to `true` for a specific control. 若要設定`UseCompatibleTextRendering`至`true`應用程式中所有支援的控制項，呼叫具有參數的方法`true`。To set `UseCompatibleTextRendering` to `true` for all supported controls in the application, call the method with a parameter of `true`.

MemberSignature.Value: public: property bool UseMnemonic { bool get(); void set(bool value); };

summary.span: 取得或設定值，指出控制項是否將控制項的 屬性中的連字號字元 (&)，解譯為便捷鍵的前置字元。

span.span: Gets or sets a value indicating whether the control interprets an ampersand character (&) in the control's property to be an access key prefix character.

value.span: 如果標籤未顯示連字號字元，且將它的顯示文字中連字號後的字元加上底線，並將加上底線的字元做為便捷鍵，則為 ，否則，如果連字號字元顯示在控制項的文字中，則為 。

span.span: if the label doesn't display the ampersand character and underlines the character after the ampersand in its displayed text and treats the underlined character as an access key; otherwise, if the ampersand character is displayed in the text of the control.
The default is .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 如果屬性設定為`true`中所定義的助憶鍵字元 （字元加上連字號） 和屬性，按 ALT + 助憶鍵字元，將焦點設定給控制項，遵循定位順序中。If the property is set to `true` and a mnemonic character (a character preceded by the ampersand) is defined in the property of the , pressing ALT+ the mnemonic character sets the focus to the control that follows the in the tab order. 您可以使用這個屬性，以提供適當的鍵盤巡覽至您表單上的控制項。You can use this property to provide proper keyboard navigation to the controls on your form. ## Examples 下列程式碼範例示範如何建立有 3d 框線和顯示使用之影像的控制項和屬性。The following code example demonstrates how to create a control that has a three-dimensional border and an image displayed using the and properties. 控制項也有標題，以指定的助憶鍵字元。The control also has a caption with a mnemonic character specified. 範例程式碼使用和屬性，以適當的大小控制項在表單上顯示於它。The example code uses the and properties to properly size the control on the form on which it is displayed. 這個範例需要已經建立且名為 imageList1 和它已經載入兩個映像。This example requires that an has been created and named imageList1 and that it has loaded two images. 這個範例也會需要的程式碼是在表單中具有加入其程式碼的命名空間。The example also requires that the code is within a form that has the namespace added to its code. [!code-cpp[Classic Label Example#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/Classic Label Example/CPP/source.cpp#1)] [!code-csharp[Classic Label Example#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/Classic Label Example/CS/source.cs#1)] [!code-vb[Classic Label Example#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Winforms/Classic Label Example/VB/source.vb#1)]
